content: whether you are advanced in tunisian crochet or just a beginner you can use this tunisian crochet mosaic bee motif to add beautiful details to your projects in the tutorial i show you how to make a potholder using this motif and two colors of chunky felting yarn * 35 g or 35 m of main color white in my case * 30 g or 30 m of contrast color blue in my case you will use an 8 mm tunisian crochet hook or a straight hook for the tunisian crochet part then add details using a 6 mm regular hook after you make it you will felt the potholder to be used in the kitchen alternatively you can use cotton to make a dishcloth or a pocket on a bag or you can use the motif in a larger piece the pattern comes in written instructions video instructions with row by row chart highlights and a chart
